Sentencas: Ceramic metal composites (cermets) containing yttria-stabilized zirconia, YSZ, and Ni particles are commonly used as anode materials in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The long-term performance of fuel cells is strictly related to both the structural and electrical properties of anode materials.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: In order to achieve high mixed electrical conductivity and high activity of electrochemical reactions and hydrocarbon fuel reforming, it is necessary to select an appropriate chemical composition and a suitable method of preparation.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: Materials containing 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia and Ni were prepared by means of two methods: co-precipitation and impregnation.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The structure of the materials was characterized by means of X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and porosity studies.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) was determined using the dilathometric method.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) and the Wagner polarization method were used to determine electrical conductivity and the electron transference numbers, respectively.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet materials
